item.description:
Update

I now know the time of the movie, we are seeing the 6:00 show, which is a non-Imax, non-3d version of the film, so your tickets should be the normal price on Fandango. 6 is a little earlier than normal, and we'll be getting out close to normal dinner time, but we'll probably have a small group and will be able to get a table.

I will be wearing my red trucker's cap with the meetup logo. I will arive at the theater at 5:15 and we'll go in and get seats at 5:40. If the movie is upstairs, I'll be waiting by the tables by the big window in the second floor lobby, and if it's downstairs I'll be behind the ropes across from the refreshment stand. Note that to get to the upstairs lobby, you have to buy a ticket.

If you miss the group before the movie, no worries, you can meet us after. We gather outside the doors of the room showing the movie afterwards. Then we head out for some munchies and drinkies.

I strongly encourage folks to buy tickets ahead of time at fandango.com.

 

 

Synopsis

 

Paramount Pictures and Marvel Entertainment present the epic adventure, "Thor," which spans the Marvel Universe from present day Earth to the realm of Asgard. At the center of the story is the mighty Thor (Chris Hemsworth), a powerful but arrogant warrior whose reckless actions reignite an ancient war. Thor is cast down to Earth by his father Odin (Anthony Hopkins) and is forced to live among humans. A beautiful, young scientist, Jane Foster (Natalie Portman), has a profound effect on Thor, as she ultimately becomes his first love. It's while here on Earth that Thor learns what it takes to be a true hero when the most dangerous villain of his world sends the darkest forces of Asgard to invade Earth.

 

Trailers 'n' Stuff

http://www.comingsoon.net/films.php?id=23177
item.how_to_find_us: Please see the description for how to find the group.
item.why: Let the Summer Superhero Season begin!
item.name: Thor
